testcase.name: assigns MEDIUM severity to auth and timeout errors

testcase.classname: Universal Error Handler Unit Tests › Severity Determination
testcase.name: returns UNKNOWN for unrecognized error types

testcase.name: identifies recoverable errors correctly

testcase.name: identifies non-recoverable errors correctly

testcase.name: falls back to default message for unknown categories

testcase.name: maps status codes correctly by category

testcase.name: throws original error when fallback fails
